title: The Freelancer Asked for Bitcoin: What Small Businesses Need to Know About Crypto Payments
description: The email arrived on a Tuesday afternoon. A graphic designer in Buenos Aires, hired for a three-week project, had a simple request: could she be paid in USDC instead of a bank transfer? For the London-based marketing agency receiving that message, it marked the first time cryptocurrency had shifted from abstract concept to operational question. […]The post The Freelancer Asked for Bitcoin: What Small Businesses Need to Know About Crypto Payments appeared first on ABC Money.
